item.title: Connected to the Cape

item.title: Dusting off the Dust
item.description: Intro Band - Song Fist of the North Star - We are Legion Tyler Jakes - Lie Awake Richard's Nixon - Rusting Red The Dirty 30's - Justine Adios Gringo - Viper's in the Tearoom Peach - I Know Better Psycotron - Blindfold Just some older tunes from the library. Some have been shared before and others have not. Please do an internet search for the bands to fan and buy.

Just some older tunes from the library. Some have been shared before and others have not. Please do an internet search for the bands to fan and buy.

item.title: Chemical BIlly "The Shaft" 1995
item.description: 1. Through The Fields I See the Township that Quivered Forever 2. Kaufman 3. Pound 4. Monsters 5. Achievement/I Walk the Line 6. Who's Got the Right to be a... gas guzzler 7. The O 8. Positive Alliance in Struggle 9. Victor Victim Imposter 10. Human Abuse Hotline 11. The Fall of Corpus Christi 12. I'm Disgusted with You 13. Eddie 14. Wad 15. Good with the F**kin "A" Image 16. Thompson Riff 17. Piss 18. Achievement 19. Cody Zamora (Peanut Meat) 19 songs 21 minutes file under dead punk rock band If you want any single track email me

item.title: fheen Out of Your Misery
item.description: 1993 recorded on cassette. Updated by removing noise, increasing levels and minor mixing. Can't do much with it as it's off the original cassette.
item.dc:creator: The Audio Nut
item.itunes:summary: 1993 recorded on cassette. Updated by removing noise, increasing levels and minor mixing. Can't do much with it as it's off the original cassette.

item.title: fheen - Hypocrisy
item.description: Recorded in 93 or 94 in 1 take on a cassette deck in a basement on Mississippi Street. Cleaned up in 2011. Additional "cleaning" done by Steve from Loadpuller. http://www.loadpuller.com/
item.dc:creator: The Audio Nut
item.itunes:summary: Recorded in 93 or 94 in 1 take on a cassette deck in a basement on Mississippi Street. Cleaned up in 2011. Additional "cleaning" done by Steve from Loadpuller. http://www.loadpuller.com/
